#summary Notes on Dingoo SDL

= Keybindings =

Native Dingo SDL key/button bindings are the same as the Dingux SDL bindings, viz.

  * D-pad up            KEY_UP
  * D-pad down          KEY_DOWN
  * D-pad left          KEY_LEFT
  * D-pad right         KEY_RIGHT
  * A button            KEY_LEFTCTRL
  * B button            KEY_LEFTALT
  * X button            KEY_SPACE
  * Y button            KEY_LEFTSHIFT
  * Left shoulder       KEY_TAB
  * Right shoulder      KEY_BACKSPACE
  * START button        KEY_ENTER
  * SELECT button       KEY_ESC
  * POWER UP button     KEY_PAUSE
